led driver how to
[HOWTO] 

You can control of LED from userspace through the node in /sys/class/leds/<device>.
The brightness file will set the LED, the value between 0 and 255.our leds supports zero or non-zero.for example:
	
	#echo 0 >  /sys/class/leds/led-blue/brightness   /*turn on blue LED*/
	#echo 1 >  /sys/class/leds/led-blue/brightness   /*turn off blue LED*/

Our driver also support ‘LED Timer Trigger’. The time trigger will change the LED status.
The “on” and “off” time can be specified via /sys/class/leds/<device>/delay_[on,off] in mlliseconds.for example:
	
	#echo timer > /sys/class/leds/led-blue/trigger   /*turn on trigger*/
	#echo 500 > /sys/class/leds/led-blue/delay_off  /*set off time 500ms*/
	#echo 500 > / sys/class/leds/led-blue/delay_on  /*set on time 500ms*/
	#echo none > /sys/class/leds/led-blue/trigger turn off trigger.
